content: Good puzzles.
Fun!
Great game!
Good challange
Great so far when is chapter 3 ready
graphics and story was awesome...Puzzles at times difficult but doable with hints..Well worth the money cant wait for part 3..
I love cinematic games best but this was atmospheric and engaging and with lots of good puzzles and game play. Very much enjoyed playing
Good long game, some interesting puzzles, one or two really tricky ones. Great value
Good game
great game.
Looking forward to chapter 3 or Epilogue. Great game!
cant wait until the next chapter!
I want the new chapter already! This one was great but went by very fast. I just found out about this game and finished the preview and both chapters in 2 days.
Very good game, challenging puzzles and great story.
Loved it
Very nice easy going game, it would be nice if the character could be seen and talk on the journey
Excellent game; loved the graphics , puzzles weren't too hard, only used clues 3 times.wished game was twice as long for the money I paid.
Great puzzles
Another fun chapter. Can't wait for the next one. Good job guys!
I'm loving this game except I wish it was all one instead of having to pay for each chapter otherwise great game a little creepy but I like that!

I liked Chapter 1 a lot more than 2. 1 had more logic puzzles & I really felt like I was figuring something out, but 2 feels like a I'm strung along with too many rooms that had just a single object I'm there to grab, and due to the fuzzy graphics I was forced to use hints a couple of times because there was an object intentionally obscured and you have no idea what you can and can't pick up in a room. The story is enjoyable, I hope the conclusion is more like 1 =)
replyContent: Thank you for the feedback Melinda! Indeed, this one was more of exploration, rather than the densely packed Chapter 1. We are aiming for a blend of Chapter 1 and 2 for the final game

content: Can't wait for the next one

Already given a review for the iPad version. This is merely a question (which I know others have had for other games) re the screen sizing. I've looked this up but couldn't seem to fix iaw instructions given on the sites. How do I achieve full screen for the iPad and tablet? The iPad has wide bars t & b, tablet thin t & b. You're techies so I thought you or someone else might have some ideas to pass on. I'm assuming it is something in the devices - looked, tried, failed. Happy NY.
This game is one of the best escape games i have played.. Worth every penny

Great game as usual. Meridian 157 series is one of my favorite online games. Very interesting and spooky and liked how the scenery changed several times. Story is really getting interesting and complex and the game leaves you at a great cliffhanger. Puzzles were not to difficult. My only critism is this chapter was a little short. I thought I was only 75% through when it ended. Anxiously waiting for Chapter 3.

Really enjoyable but some puzzles were too difficult ( made absolutely no sense to figure out without going online because the help gave no clue). The help did its job when needed directionally. So very much looking forward to the Conclusion!!
This is a well made not too hard to play game. Loved all 3 of them. Keep up the great work!!!
Really makes you think. Brilliant graphics and austere surroundings. Look forward to chapter 3.
Great game. Can't wait to play the next chapter.
great puzzle game. cant wait for the 3rd chapter lol. their should be a 3rd chapter to end this adventure.
Ok
Good gameplay, nice plot, wish there was a little bit more freedom with the controls that art work was great
Fun abd addicting game.
Brilliant! But I need chapter 3!
Game is good would give it five but I just have a preference that games conclude with a definitive ending. When if the conclusion of this series is released I will definitely up the rating to five.
Great game!
Very nice style was refreshing can't wait for the next
Lot'sa good stuff in this one!!??!!
Atmospheric game. Looking forward to the last chapter. Great work by a small team.
Never played a game like this but I really enjoyed it.
Very enjoyable, simple but effective user interface. Graphics beautifully drawn (but just static pictures). Puzzles at a good level, occasionally a bit too tricky!
Role on chapter three.
Fun and challenging. Best game in the series so far.
Involving. Look forward to next chapter
Great new chapter of the series, I can't wait until chapter 3 comes out. The story is interesting and the puzzles are perfect. Thanks for a great game!
All around excellent. Some tricky puzzles. Makes me feel like I'm playing Myst!!!
Awsome......now give me another chapter....i want ch 3 now
Great game
Cool game..enjoyed it..graphics are cool..
A bit creepy but really good. Great graphics with some tough but solvable puzzles.
Graphics are very good, puzzels are sometimes a chore but generally a good game.

I enjoyed all three instalments of this game so far. I cannot wait until chapter three comes out. I don't ever but games but I don't regret buying these at all. Do we have an estimate on chapter three?
This game is so good, atmospheric and intriguing I can't wait to see what happens!
Great game
Awesome game! Can't wait for the next release!

A classic puzzle game feel with excellent graphics where you have to solve the riddles from the clues. There's a certain amount of tension in trying to make sure that you aren't missing anything. I wish there was the sound of the character talking to themself.
Great game!

This is a great series! I didn't realize the team was so small. Great job. My only complaint in an otherwise very enjoyable experience: the text boxes linger just a little too long and hide too much of the screen. Perhaps there should be a button to clear the dialogue yourself when you are finished reading. The camera feature is my favourite part of the game - I wish more games in this style would have them.
Thank you for this GREAT game!!!
Well worth the experience and the cost!
I was so mad to see "to be concluded"! Where's the next one?! I need it now!
I quite liked it
replyContent: Thank you Alyssa! Glad to hear that!

content: Great fun.
Overall well made. Both graphic storywise and interaction. Recomended. Waiting for next chapter
Good game with plenty of puzzles
Great graphics, good controls, cook story. Only reason missing one start is that some of the puzzles are really, really obtuse and the hints don't nudge you, they just give it away.
Chapter 1 was a boat: Chapter 2 a train and the same type of puzzles, but wow, total tripe.
replyContent: Sorry to hear you didn't like it, we thought the puzzles were fairly varied, but we will also keep your feedback in mind for the future chapters. Thank you

content: Great game, done very well by it's developers. No ads bombarding me every step of the way, and the puzzles were a challenge without being impossible to solve. Well worth the investment of a few dollars to while away an entire evening.
When chapter 3 can't get enough best escape ever
Very good
Loved the game and completed
Visually excellent. Some of the puzzles are very obtuse though. When is the concluding chapter out?
Interesting story, but it would have been great to have some character interaction.
Loved it!
great game for adventure-puzzle enthusiasts. most enjoyable. good hints help alot.

Pretty good overall. A couple puzzles were a bit hard to solve. Graphics were amazing. After 1 and 2 being so good, I hope 3 can equal or top them. Well worth the price especially if it is used to finish the game.
It's a 4.5 star game, but could be 5 star if it was a bit longer in gameplay.
Even better than the last, better graphics, a more interesting story, more variety, and longer. The beginning of the game was a bit dull, but it quickly picked up. I'm eagerly awaiting part three.

Another fantastic experience provided to us by I assume are the stys brothers? Either way Fantastic Job y'all. Sorry I didn't help with beta testing on this one. Y'all are epic. Keep up the great work.
Another fantastic entry to the Meridian 157 series. I am so looking forward to Chapter 3.
This chapter was just as enjoyable to play as the first. I can't put it down and don't want the story to end. I will now get the third chapter.
Very nice! Interesting story line, suitably challenging puzzles. Hope you're working already on the next chapter :)
Very enjoyable
I love the detail, length, difficulty of this and Chapter 1! Excited for Chapter 3!
Played through twice so far both for the atmosphere and the puzzles

Really enjoyed this one, tidy game play, decent graphics, smooth loading & additional functionality. Would love to see a less linear approach in some places, but great atmospherics & well worth payment. Looking forward to the final installment.
Great mysterious point&click game.
Better. The only confusing puzzle was the calendar puzzle. But I think that I just wasn't thinking it through.

Enjoyable game. Nice that it allows you to play on hard mode if you don't want the hints. If you're not well versed in this type of game play on normal mode, and if you really cannot figure out the mini game it will allow you to pass it and move on. I think this option allows for a wider range of ages and gaming ability. (Fun for everyone) Solid work. Can't wait for the next chapter.
Great game to pass time. Graphics are a bit lackluster, and some of the puzzles are confusing; but overall, it's a game worth the price!
Good game
Great game, smooth and quick transitions between scenes. The story is very good too. The puzzles vary in difficulty, but none are frustrating or too difficult to solve. Keep em coming.
Pretty good, some puzzles not very clear.
I wish it was longer
Amazing
I liked the game. I found the atmosphere and music at times, spooky. This kept my interest and I enjoyed playing it. I look forward to the next one. There is a next one yes?
...a fun ride - over too quick
Excellent
An excellent adventure puzzle game. The best there is. No other game comes close to this quality.
Will there be chapter 3 ?
AMAZING GAME! Love love love the storyline and how engaging it is. Scary but not in an over the top way. Brilliant! Well done! Cannot wait for Chapter 3!!
Great game.
Great game, play the first first... Looking forward to the last...
So great. It's so hard to find point and click adventures that focus on the adventure and not stupid hidden objects. Please make more!
Great game,

Graphics are lacking big time, not much control, and some of the puzzles are not very clear. Even after you figure out the answer/objective, it sometimes isn't clear on how to complete the puzzle. I was hoping it would be more like The Room or House of da Vinci.
Puzzles were amazing. Couldn't wait to get back to it!

Everything, from the puzzles to the storyline- it was fantastic as expected from the previous game. My only complaint is that it felt quite short. Also I would like to see more puzzles in the future; even more challenging maybe. Eagerly waiting for more content!
Good game. I liked it. Only thing is some of the puzzles i didnt understand how to solve them and the hints gave you the solution instead of actual hints.
Great game!
Excellent puzzle. Some were quite challenging and I had to stop away for a few days and come back to solve. Really enjoyed the game, ready for the next installment!
Fun and learning more about this puzzle
Very adventurous

Marian 157: chapter 2 is a very well done game. The graphics are outstanding. Play is well thought-out and easy to play. Most of the hints are provided and I did use a few, even when I knew how to solve it so that I could move on. The creators did a super job. Download this app and you will not be disappointed..
Great game
Great chapter! Looking forward to the conclusion!
Cant praise the developers enough! I hope they never stop creating this style of game. My daughters and I work thru the game together and love it. Keep 'em coming😍!
Was ok. Chapter 1 was better. A few puzzles lacked logical solutions. Random guessing seemed to be an easier solution on a couple. Good story though, and a bit longer than ch.1.
It was fun. My only recommendation would be to make objects for pick up a little brighter.

Enjoyed. Good range of beginner/intermediate puzzles with hints turned on. Liked that the hints weren't all or nothing. I was never so stuck that I just wanted to quit.Whats the eta for chapter 3? Chapter 2 felt kinda short in comparison to chp 1. BOO! Tablet had the lower navigation buttons displayed over the lower portion of the play area. Kept accidentally kicking myself out of the game. Not sure if that is in the design or just my tablet. Had a really hard time opening the camera!!!!
Fun game,
Great! Loved it ❤️
Enjoyable, engrossing game. Well made.
As point and click games go. This is the bees knees, try chapter 1and 2 yourself you won't be disappointed.
Very fun and immersive. Best game on the app store in my opinion. Can't wait for the next one!
Excellent game once again, only wish it was longer!
Exceptional
Challenging
Really enjoyable game to play 😊
Great game, graphics, puzzles. A bit short but still a good game.
Eagerly awaiting one more chapter (at the end of the gameplay, the final text is "To be concluded.") Each chapter has improved over the previous one.
Cool game
Excellent Game. Good graphics. Intriguing puzzles. I love these type of games and can't wait until the next chapter is released.
Brilliant game, well worth buying..looking forward to the next chapter.
Enjoyable but a couple of puzzles didn't make sense to me, especially the calendar at the end. (But that's the brilliance of this game - the puzzles vary in difficulty.)
Nice
I liked it. Simple, fun, very much like my favorite game of all time, MYST. (With helps if needed)
Great atmosphere, intriguing story, and i LOVED the puzzles. Satisfying length, definitely worth the price of admission!

Awesome game! I sometimes wish the clues were a little more vague at first ... sometimes I just don't know where to go anymore and just need a lil' push in the right direction. Graphics and storyline are great! Looking forward to the next chapter! Good bang 4 buck ratio, I love that it's a smaller price so you can 'spread' the cost through time.
One of the best adventure games on Android. My only suggestion is to make the diaries able to be read with a pop-up window with larger text or something. I had to get real close to phone to read them
No no no no noooooo please i need the next chapter PLEASE 😭😢
Best puzzle game I've ever played

Love the Meridian 157 series. The graphics are pretty good and the sound is done the way I like - not annoying. My only hang-up is that this installment, like the others, has puzzles and/or clues that either don't seem to make sense or take so long to figure out that it distracts you from following the storyline. I'm hoping the conclusion is well thought out.
Not a bad experience overall. Puzzles are too easy. Not much narrative. Graphics are passable. It's a decent time waster.
Love the game can't wait for the conclusion
Dope. Worth the price

Chapter two continues perfectly the atmosphere from chapter one. As you solve the puzzles, which with the aid of the camera really doesn't slow you down, the game progresses along at a steady pace. The ending scene leaves the third chapter wide open to many possibilities. Keep up the great work.

I enjoyed the first chapters a lot. I didn't get many of the puzzles in this and even when I used the hints some of the solutions made little sense. Especially the last one. There is a fine balance between boring, engaging and confusing. This one falls in between the last two.
Had fun playing this chapter. The puzzles were challenging but not ridiculously difficult. But it ended too quickly! Hope the next chapter comes soon. Need more creepy dark guy. 🖤

Really enjoying the game as it has evolved, graphics are good, puzzles are not over the top. A bit of backward and forwards to complete some bits. A move function on still pictures with a zoom action would be good. Looking forward to the finale!
Great puzzles. The music was scratchy, had to turn it down.

Love the game and story line but I kinda hate the controls on it... It's very restrictive you can't look around but honestly, I'll still play it because the story line is pretty fun and I'm impatient to know more. Overall I love it.

Great game although the environment is a bit dismal. Good game flow and easy access to hints should you need them. A few of the puzzles are bit cryptic and therefore frustrating and it took me a while to go back past the frozen lake to access the last part of the game but overall it was entertaining.
Long gameplay, good puzzles, handy hints
Another good installment of this game. Good puzzles, some pretty hard. Will definately play chapter 3 when it comes out!
Good game! You guys did a great job! Can't wait for the next one. God Bless!
Amazing and engaging game
puzzles and graphics were amazing
Fantastic. One of the best I've played. By far the best graphics. Can't wait for the next one.
Great puzzles.well worth the price.
Good graphics and nice game play. Cant wait for the conclusion. Only wish it would have been longer

A really beautiful puzzle game. Only minor criticisms: it'd be nice if the hints were a little more vague rather than giving solutions, and if there was a clearer indication when you solved some of the puzzles (I play without sound). Sometimes I think I've solved a puzzle but nothing happens, it isn't until it tells me something like "I should leave the door open" that I realise I was successful.

I felt this was a letdown from Chapter 1, which was brilliant IMO. This iteration felt more rushed with the environments and puzzles (some of which I'm still struggling to make sense of). I've played through this journey on the higher difficulty setting without consulting any guides; there were puzzles in this chapter that drove up the overall completion time drastically. That being said, I feel the length of the chapter is an adequate reflection of the price should one opt to play this way.
Great game.
I really like it, it's just not as stunning as the previous chapters
Good game but when is the next chapter being released. I have a felling chapter 3 will not be the end, and that would be fantastic.
Excellent game!

Brilliant! The puzzles are great - all very solvable though some required a lot more thought than others - the camera function makes all the difference. Well worth the money - every time I thought I'd finished another section opened. Can't wait for Chapter 3!
Fun puzzles. Intuitive. Moderate difficulty.
Loved it. Very pleasant. Great touch controls, hints if needed.
Awesome
Waiting for chapter 3 now.....

Can't even launch. Only game/app to trigger the "Unable to establish connection to Google's Licensing server" error message, and won't launch. Android 8.1.0 Build ACF202 Phone: BBD100-2 (Blackberry Motion -- great Android phone, but VERY rare)
replyContent: Hello Al, please contact us at contact@novasoftinteractive.com and we will sort this out.

content: Awesome and long game! Challenging puzzles. I'm looking forward to the next installment!
Some of the puzzles are a little frustrating but otherwise a good game. Hope to see chapter 3 soon.

I've played all three episodes and have enjoyed them all. The story line helps to keep you engaged. The puzzles are fairly straightforward and there plenty clues to help you. The graphics are well done. Thanks guys. Can't wait for the next chapter.
Great job guys 👍Thoroughly enjoyed this experience - graphics were good, storyline interesting and the puzzles were logical with clear hints if you got stuck - looking forward to the next one.
Loved every bit of it. The gameplay, mood, price all good. Can't wait to see next installment. Please keep it up, games like yours are unfortunately rare.
This game really rocks my boat..... Can't wait for chapter 3......hurry

The game was excellent! Thoroughly enjoyed it, loved the new feature of merging items, however, the game was a little short lived. I was expecting it to last a little longer. Either way, thumbs up to the developers. Looking forward to the next Chapter.
Enjoyed it but found it much easier/faster to complete than chapter 1. Great storyline.

Had to use the Magnifying glass 5-6 times. Couple of the puzzles could have used more clues to solve. i.e. the purple & red pipe one, & 1 early on. Graphics very realistic. Controls are easy. And most puzzles were chalenging but solvable. Great job! I love this style of game! Thanks for no long 'book' at begining or through out. I dont want to read a story! I want to play a game! It kept my attention & I really enjoyed it!

A bit disappointing. The game itself is decent and the puzzles are OK, nothing really challenging or unique. The story was a let down, the 1st game felt like it was going somewhere, nothing happened in this chapter and then it ends unexpectedly. It just all feels a bit pointless. There are better games out there for free.
Challenging but not impossible. Fun
👍🤩 more please
This game is creepy, i really wanna know what happens

Enjoyed this one even more than chapter one. The logical connection between clues and puzzles felt better as it went, which made the pace more enjoyable. I play without hints, but a few are really abstract. The final puzzle made no sense at all to me. I'll give a fifth star if you can convince me it was possible to discern. UPDATE: Fifth star added. I'm the dummy. Going back under my rock until chapter three comes out. :)
replyContent: Nonsense it is the one puzzle we get emailed about the most asking for help! In retrospect it may have been a bit obscure, we will work on that :) thank you for the feedback!

content: Very enjoyable...nice puzzles and interesting story...I look forward to the next installment

Conceptually this game is awesome, but some of the puzzles just make no sense. For example, I still dont understand the garage door puzzle. I'd like to see hints on how to solve rather than just solutions thrown at you.
replyContent: Hello Zack, the hints should guide you step by step to the solution, but we will keep this in mind for the future games. As for the garage door puzzle, the numbers on top of the lever panel correspond to the positions on the calendar (the calendar and lever panel have the same arrangement of cells). Thanks for the feedback!

content: A brilliant game! Looking forward to the conclusion!
Fairly addictive. Fun puzzles.
Great. One of the best puzzle games
Love this game. Thought it was a little easier than the 1st chapter. I gotta get 3. What came out that hole? Or in scaryish
Awsome game

I have enjoyed the 3 installments of Meridian 157. The story is interesting and each chapter brings challenging puzzles and new tools to use to help solve them. I'm looking forward to the conclusion of Meridian 157. This game scratches the itch of The Room type games. Meridian 157 stands out in quality that similar games lack. I hope to see more from the team!
It was fun
Very good value

Well done! I was disappointed that it came to an end. Yes, I used hints. They didn't give much away. I didn't have to use them for the puzzles, just when I didn't know what to do next. Mostly, it flowed well. Ready for chapter 3. Please keep them coming. Other story lines would be fine as long as you don't go dark. I like your work. Wish I could find more like it.
Once again really well made, with a nice difficulty of the puzzles. I must say I struggled with some of them. I can't wait till the next chapter is out, very curious how this ends.
Waiting for the conclusion, please hurry.
Very good not too hard just right for an occasional player
Good game but needed a couple of clues. One I didn't get even with the clues, so had to skip. Still didn't get it!
replyContent: Hello Ruth, thank you for letting us know! Feel free to contact us at any time at contact@novasoftinteractive.com if you are stuck, we are happy to help people! :)

content: Loved it even better than chapter 1. Smooth play. Can't wait for the continuation! Has me hanging on edge. Is there a mailing list I can join to get notified?

I would have easily payed more for this game-- it's really fantastic. Well-designed logical puzzles and gameplay, and it was long and thoughtfully done. I'm looking forward to more from this developer!

I love your Meridian series, well-thought-made game. also the puzzles are right on spot.loved getting lost in all twists an turns. Graphics amazing, sound and music were awesome. Will be glad when you come out with more games, and series.
Fun game. Love the puzzles and the graphics.
Great point and click adventure

A decent game, but WAY too short for it's price. Puzzles are decent with a fair bit of back and forth to achieve each task. Graphics are good, though not as detailed as I'd like. A great game that needs to be at LEAST twice its size to be a worthy purchase.

Wow what a game I just completed it in one go i can't wait for chapter 3 i put off buying these meridian games after I didn't enjoy the free demo you guys released a while back but i don't mind saying that i was wrong to not give these games a chance but i am glad i did. I can't heap enough praise upon the shoulders of the developers. Very well done guys
replyContent: Thank you so much for your words of encouragement Adam! Yes, admittedly the prologue isn't as good as it could have been. It was the first game we have ever made so we were still learning the ropes. So glad to hear we are going in the right direction, thanks for the review!

content: Enjoying the story. I liked the dream sequence! Caught me by surprise. Looking forward to continuing the game. Good series
Good, not great. Kind of dark in some places and hard to see if there is anything I should pick up.
Good point and click puzzler. Graphics are good, the puzzles fairly easy and a decent length of play. There were several times where the backpack contents were covering up something important.

Re-written review after developer feedback. This is the first and only game I know that has a setting for colourblindness - top marks for that. The puzzles are good, and the whole game is brilliant, and will enjoy it even more now I know about this setting. Its there a chapter 3 in the making? Really hope so
replyContent: Hello Mark, I sent you an email, but i hope you did find the "color blind mode" in the settings, and I hope others also find it to be useful as well!

content: Im ready for the conclusion!
Excellent Game. I have good time

It was good. But nothing close to the intensity as the Prologue or Chapter 1. I kinda feel like it was too short. I only started this 2 hours ago and already it's done. But I'll still be watching for the next chapter. Thanks!
replyContent: Thank you so much for the feedback Nacol, we tried to go a slightly different direction with this one (more exploration) but I think we will go back to a style in between this one and the Prologue/Chapter 1. Again, thank you so much for the feedback!

content: A game of intelligence and discovery. Well done !
This is a great series, challenging puzzles but logical and reasonable. In the style of Myst-type games. Outstanding graphics.

Wow, you have to try these games! I'm never disappointed, they're beautifully done. Another chapter with a fun story line. Fun, challenging and unique puzzles all wrapped up into a neat package with beautiful graphics. Just wow. Love the new feature of combining items, maybe in the final chapter you can add a progress meter on the main menu. I'm never sure how close to the end I am and sometimes you just want to drag it out so it doesn't end so soon.
I love this game and I cant wait for the conclusion!
So fun. Loved it.
Another great game. Only issue was the words were a little difficult to read. Can't wait for Chapter 3!!!
Great! Can't wait for the next one!
How nice to have a game where a puzzle isn't solvable by someone who has slight red/green color blindness. Guess I'll have to wait and ask a friend for help.
replyContent: Turn on "Color blind" mode!!! We have a mode just for you, in the settings! We will try to make this option more visible so that people know its there. Hope you found it!

content: Fun, relatively easy and good story
Looking forward to the next chapter

I love this game. Better than most. Wish they did more. Fingers crossed they will as I get quite bored of the others available. Its very easy to move around, even on my phone. Puzzles are tough but well worth it. Thank you.
This was fun but the puzzles were too easy. It also felt way shorter than the previous chapter. I completed it it just under an hour and a half.

Excellent continuation of the game, way longer than I expected, very detailed. Puzzels were really good, most fairly easy but at least well thought out. Totally recommend if you like this sort of game style.
Great game (all 3)!!!!!! Nice to have the choice to play normal or hard I am first in line to buy the next chapter!!! Keep them coming please
I love these games. Can't wait for the conclusion. I hope you start another saga or series next.
replyContent: We have a few plans for the future :) thank you for the review!

content: Amazing game. Cant wait for 3 and more more and more.

Intelligent and yet simplistic continuation of the previous two episodes of this mystery. Uncover clues to the mystery and find more questions to ponder. No running around or swinging from ropes. No shooting or timed exercises but heart stopping silence and doors which lead to heaven knows what? Puzzles where you have to use your memory and mental skill to progress. Take your camera, it can be your only friend.

Overall a decent game. Good story. Puzzles weren't really too hard (no hints for me) but I did find them vague at times. Some puzzles were hard to see and not really difficult, in other words just make the solution something I need to think about, not something that relies on bad lighting or vaguely drawn clues to solve. I hate to use this word but I will, it's at times closer to 'trickery' than to logic. Still, I think a good game, great value for the money. Hopefully next one will be better.
replyContent: Thanks for the feedback Ronnie, we will definitely take it into account when making our future games!

content: Another wowww factor !!! my money was so well spent ! Well worth the download and money. So affordable for such high quality game. Big thank you.....cannot wait for the conclusion chapter 3
Loved it. Escape adventure games with cameras are the best. A few tricky puzzles but I loved the challenge.
Great game! Can't wait for the next one!
Great game. Good puzzles.
Satisfying continuation!
Excellent work, really enjoyed the game!

Great addition to the series. Perfect puzzles in that they are difficult at times but not to the point of having to look for a guide aka cheat 😀 Great hint system too, gives you the option of getting just a little hint instead of just telling you what to do. I don't love the fact that the story feels as though its never going to reveal itself, but I'm not that upset about it lol

Another great entry. Everything about this game was perfect. The atmosphere was great, as were the graphics and the music. The story was great as well! The puzzles werent too hard and some I was even able to guess at with out using the clues. The hint system was great as well. I can't wait for the final chapter! (Although I'm really sad that there is only going to be one more chapter) I can't wait to see what the devs have in store for the next/future games. Great Job!
Lovely graphics and not too challenging.
bad game . only lose money
replyContent: Hey Omar, we would love to hear what you didn't like about the game, feel free to contact us at contact@novasoftinteractive.com

content: The Meridian series are great games and a lot of fun to play. I just wish they'd make more.
If you like puzzle solving games, this is one of the best I've played.
So great. Hope there is a chapter 3
Where is chapter 3 ??? You cant leave me in limbo 😱
Really enjoyable adventure, with some interesting puzzles and an engaging backstory. Can't wait for the final chapter!
Fun, a bit too easy and not quite as good as the last game, but pretty good nonetheless. Worth the money anyways.
Can't wait for the next chapter!

Point and click puzzle game. Quite good but the controls can be a little annoying as the loot bag blocks the view if you don't close it. However I do like the camera function to help me remember clues. The hints are good and also help you solve some puzzles. It can be a little annoying to remember and find your way around as there are too many rooms and passage ways. These might be fun for some but I don't like switching between areas as often as this game has me do.
replyContent: Fair enough Chris, good to know that the camera helped, however thank you for the feedback regarding the switching of areas! Thank you!

content: Great game. Looking forward to the final chapter! Puzzles require some decent maths ability.
Very fun and nostalgic feeling point and click puzzle game. Puzzles require some thought, nifty note taking tool of a camera. Enjoyed both so far. Waiting for the 3rd.
Chapter 2 is nearly perfect, looking forward to the next. Great job!
So good! Frustratingly good. Can't wait for part 3!
Good puzzles. Challenging, but not impossible. Looking forward to chapter 3.
can't wait for the last chapter!!

This is an excellent adventure. The chapter span a huge landscape to explore. It's not clear what's going on in terms of the story but it's kind of like a giant escape the room game. I played prologue and both chapters and is nice to have this available for android! I am hopi g there is more to come!
replyContent: Hello Cindy! Yes in fact we are working on the final chapter of the series right now! We also have a few plans for the future in terms of Puzzle-Adventure games as well :) thank you for the review!

content: And yet another wonderful game. Can not wait for Chapter 3. Recommended to all, you won't be disappointed. Thanks Devs.
Great sequel, loved the games and was a decent length. Good price also.
Great game. Great value. Worth the price.
Need more another chapter!!! I need to know what happen main charather!!! 😢😢
Highly impressed-worth ever penny!
Really enjoyed it just wish it was longer
Exceptional
Too easy..boring
replyContent: Hello Viola, thanks for the feedback, we would love to hear more if you the chance to contact us (contact@novasoftinteractive.com)!

content: Cannot wait for conclusion!
Very good adventure game. Most puzzles were fairly straightforward and enjoyable. Nice game length. Can't wait for the next chapter.
Get it on sale, pretty short for what it costs.
replyContent: Hey Paul, we would love to hear more if you have the chance to contact us at contact@novasoftinteractive.com

content: Good game play. Nice graphics. Worth the $$. Looking forward to chapter 3. Hope it uses 360 visual virtual play so you can look around more.
Chapter 2 didn't disappoint! Looking forward to the next Chapter!

Holy crow, what a great series! Good puzzles, a bit of challenge but not so much that it prevents relaxation. Story line is fabulous and creepy. Can't wait for the conclusion. Was hoping to see a pre-register button, or notification of release sign up but no such luck. Hopefully it's not so far off in the future that I forget. Really great series, devs. :D
Everything from the story, to the puzzles, to the atmosphere reels you in. I can't wait for the conclusion in part 3!

I truly enjoyed this game.The best of the series. The puzzles were challenging yet easy enough for me to figure out although I will admit sometimes its just dumb luck. The end came too soon. Can not wait for the next installment.
This is such a fantastic game! Lovely graphics, great puzzles and a very eerie atmosphere. One of the best point and click games I've played. Well Done, guys!!
Very nice game

As I said before it is the last of the the "I woken up in a jail cell or crashed the car at the Old Hotel, locked room, find the keys, spanner, torch )games . they have been superseded by The DaVinci type games or rusty Lake but it is a very good one its type. it's just very outdated. I do not like the fact that you have to pay for each instalment after getting the first one free, apart from that good game.
A bit disappointed after chapter1 but still good
replyContent: Hey Yui, yes we went in a slightly different direction with this game, just to try things out. We would love to hear more of your comments (contact@novasoftinteractive.com) if you have the chance! Thank you for the feedback!

content: Excellent game. Free hints awesome! Sometimes really hard to figure out what comes next, doesn't flow as well as I would like, so free hints were very valuable, but great overall.
Rather short game, but enjoyable.
Yet again had me glued to the game from the beginning to the end. Can't wait for Chapter 3...

Loved it! Each chapter gets more intriguing and the challenges are just hard enough on no hints! Graphics are great, very realistic, controls are spot on! Touch and it responds! Great game guys, can't wait for conclusion!

Good game. Story could be interesting but its very thin. Game was short but priced reasonably in my opinion. Puzzles are pretty straight forward and not at all frustrating. I played on hard and had no issues or glitches. Looking forward to another chapter.
Oddity of loneliness and anticipation...

This episodic point and click is quite brilliant. Each chapter is slightly better than the one before. Can't wait for the conclusion myself and I encourage anyone who has an penchant for mystery and intrigue in their point and clicks to give this a try; the first part is free so why not? You just might be surprised. A final note to the developers: Well done on this series so far, please continue to make great adventures after Meridian concludes.
Awesome. The storyline has me hooked! I can't wait for the next installment!!
Really good point and click game. Great storyline, love the puzzles, the logic and the brain teasers. very few puzzles that I can't follow the logic behind. Yet I can't wait for the next chapter...
Super fun follow up to the previous chapters! Story is engrossing and the puzzles are simple yet tricky. Multiple hours of gameplay provided. I can't wait for the conclusion!
Great game. love puzzle games with mystery, puzzles not to complex and not to easy either. Can't wait for the last chapter
Definitely Need the Hints.
Great quest. Looking for more.
I loved it. Can't wait for the next chapter
Great game! Just the right amount of difficulty and clues. Logical not random. Excellent graphics and control. Looking forward to chapter 3.

Oh boy, chapter 2 is out! again, I really enjoyed the nice balance between the quiet quest for the truth about this place and the eerie cutscenes! Just what is this place?? :D the graphics are gorgeous per usual. I also loved the notebook entries that gave some context to the story, I wish there were more. Looking forward to new chapters 🤗❤️ it really is a one of a kind puzzle game.
Stunning graphics and helpful hints when I needed them. Loved the game(s)! Can't wait for the next one...
Everything about Meridian 157 is awesome! Can't wait for chapter 3!
Very good game and level of difficulty

Great workmanship on the scenes, loved the detail and texture coupled with the ethereal music, I felt to be immersed in an suspenseful exploration of lives and places with unknown and forboddoon expectations. Can't wait for the conclusion!
Thanks guys..I LOVE these type of games that manage to immerse you even on a mobile/cell screen. Well done..fantastic game..can't wait for the conclusion 🙂
Super game!!

Very well made, the puzzles all make sense. I've only played Meridian games on "Hard mode" and they're still very viable. No outside knowledge is necessary to solve the puzzles and the story is also neat! Can't wait for Chapter 3.
Very well done honestly, definitely worth the wait from Chapter 1. Looking forward to the Final Chapter, hopefully soon?
LOVE IT!!!! Need Chapter 3!!!!
Difficult enough to make it interesting but not to become too frustrating. Good level of hints. Good art. The developers have got the right ballance. Looking forward to chapter 3.
Entertaining... Looking forward to the next chapter
Great casual game and puzzles!

Meridian 157 is hands down one of the best games I've ever had the pleasure of experiencing. I've been gaming since the early 90's. I started out on the SNES, a console I still have in my posession and which is still in use on a weekly basis. To this day I have yet to encounter a valid contender to what I concider the best game ever made: Super Metroid... Imo, Meridian 157 is pretty much on par with Super Metroid. I am forever grateful to the devs for bringing me this masterpiece of a game.
Great graphics, story and game play. Creepy vibe the whole time. The puzzles aren't terribly hard. The camera is genius and the hint feature is perfect. Good job guys. Can't wait for the next one.
Really enjoyable
This was just as good as the first well worth the money. I think I This game series is going to be a classic if the other parts are just as good as the first 2.
Interesting, not so challenging, but still great. Waiting for chapter 3!
replyContent: You are too smart! We will have to make an extra hard "Pavel Mode" just for you ;) thanks for the feedback!

content: Good sequel! Waiting for part 3!

Chapter 1 was fun but very frustrating. This chapter was much better - the clues were logical, and the puzzles were occasionally challenging but not overly difficult. I kept intending to pause but ended up playing through in one sitting. Looking forward to the concluding chapter.
replyContent: Thank you for the feedback Scott! Glad to hear you enjoyed this one more!

content: Fun! Logical puzzles. Nice to have hints if you do get stuck. Looking forward to chapter 3!

I enjoyed this chapter! It's not my favorite part of the story though. I missed all the reading sections that were in the other chapters. They gave more atmosphere to the game. There were a few diary entries and the like here, but I wish there were more. I also didn't understand the dice puzzle or how the garage door puzzle matched the calendar key. But I am excited to see how this ends and who the shadowy figure is. And what is Lambda??? Too many questions to miss the last chapter.
Really good. Well worth the money.

Another wonderful game by these guys. Gameplay and graphics are very nice. I could almost figure most of the puzzles. Well done, please don't quit making these kinds of games, I've alwas loved a point and click adventure as opposed to fighting and matching. Thank you!!
Best game I've played in a long time! Just challenging enough and really long.
Brilliant, cant wait for next chapter
Keeps getting better.

You've outdone yourselves!! It was every bit as amazing as the first two, and even longer which is amazing. Although I did notice a date error between the first and second entry in the first journal. (It should be march 6th unless they left early) I cannot wait for the conclusion!!

Loving the Meridian series! Great amount of game play for the price. Some sneaky challenging puzzles. Decent clues when needed. Although it bothered me that for the most part there was only 1 thing to do/ puzzle to solve at a time. I also wish the new build feature would be used more. And so many objects that seemed like you could interact with but didn't serve a purpose other than atmosphere. Maybe space out the journal entries more, it's a lot to read at once. Keep up the good work guys!
More like this please!
Brilliant
Awesome game!! Not to easy or too hard! Puzzles all make sense!!! Can't wait for the next one!!
Amazing

I really liked it. I am eager to learn more about the (hi)story of this place. I might have missed it but I was confused by the sudden winter and whether I have just used all of my items or if they disappeared after each section. Still enjoyed it :thumbsup:
Super Ideen, graphisch realistisch umgestzt, Rätsel mit mittlerem Schwierigkeitsgrad. Leider schon wieder vorbei, längere Wartezeit auf nächstes Kapitel!

Another great chapter to this series. Loving it. Just enough suspense and curiosity to keep you going. Can't wait until Part 3... I just pray it's sooner than later. I'm ready to find out who the "shadow people" are and what happened, and what is going to be the fate of the player. Please don't let it take too long.
Good fun, mostly logical puzzles. My least favourite one was tic-tac-toe lock. Looking forward to conclusion.
replyContent: Thanks for the review, and especially the feedback Hrvoje!

content: Another great chapter. Love the artwork, the puzzles and the story. Look forward to the next (hopefully not final) chapter. Well done.
Couldn't figure out the logic behind the calendar puzzle. Rest were doable

Excellent graphics and atmosphere (esp when you feel like you're being "stalked" by the man). Puzzles are not too hard. There's a bug where you pick up one of the gears - you get a gear everytime you click on the pipes so I ended up with many gears. Still I really enjoyed the game.
replyContent: Hello Eunice, thank you for the review! And thank you for the feedback, this bug should be fixed in the latest version :)

content: Great game, great experience, enthralling story line. Need the next chapter please!!!
Really like this game and can't wait for the final chapter! When is it coming out?!
replyContent: Probably in October, we plan on making the last one longer :) Thanks for the review!

content: A step back. Game play feels clunky compared to previous releases. A weird delay when completing puzzles, feedback takes a second or two. Graphics are overall hazy.. Two of the first 8 or so puzzles are quite frankly nonsensical.
replyContent: Strange, we didn't change anything with the mechanics of the game but we will look into it. Could you let us know which puzzles were nonsensical? We added more logic to most puzzles in this game

content: Awesome!!! Keep them coming..
Another brilliant entry in this series 😊
Great game at a great price point! Graphics are very good.
